title: Racoons picnic
creator_credit: Crawley Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: The adventures of two young raccoons during a daylight safari in search of food. Beatrice and Willie set off through the woods and on reaching a lake, discover lunches left by two boys swimming. The boys discover the scavengers, the scavengers discover the angry boys and scamper off back to the safety of the woods.
